member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.deleteUserByName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DELETE FROM usuario WHERE nombre = @name.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.insertAplicationRol
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO aplicacionrole (idrol,idaplicacion) VALUES(@idRol, @idAplication).

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.insertRol
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO rol (tiporol) VALUES(@tipoRol).

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.insertUser
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO usuario (nombre, password,idrol) VALUES(@name, @pass, @idrol).

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectApplication
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM aplicacion a.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectRolByTipoRol
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM rol WHERE tiporol =@tipoRol.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectRoltipo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT r.tiporol FROM rol r.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectRolTipoRolByIdRol
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT r.tiporol FROM rol r WHERE r.idrol = @idRol.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectUser
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM usuario.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectUserByIdRol
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT u.nombre FROM usuario u WHERE u.idrol = @idRol.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectUserByNombre
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM usuario u WHERE u.nombre = @name.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.selectUserNombre
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT nombre FROM usuario.

member.name: P:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources.updateUserByName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE usuario SET nombre = @newName, password = @pass, idrol = @idRol WHERE nombre = @oldName.

member.name: T:NOTARIA.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
